languages.text: {n}Арджента достает из сумки паек и протягивает его девочке вместе с походной флягой.{/n} "Возьми мой. Дети не должны страдать за ошибки родителей".
{n}Argenta takes rations from her bag and holds them out to the little girl along with her flask.{/n} "Take mine. Children should not suffer for their parents' mistakes."
languages.original_text: {n}Арджента достает из сумки паек и протягивает его девочке вместе с походной флягой.{/n} "Возьми мой. Дети не должны страдать за ошибки родителей".

languages.text: {n}Argenta recoge unas raciones de su bolsa y se las entrega a la niña junto con su petaca.{/n} «Aquí tienes. Los niños no tendrían que sufrir por los errores de sus padres».
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta takes rations from her bag and holds them out to the little girl along with her flask.{/n} "Take mine. Children should not suffer for their parents' mistakes."

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta recoge unas raciones de su bolsa y se las entrega a la niña junto con su petaca.{/n} «Aquí tienes. Los niños no tendrían que sufrir por los errores de sus padres».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}アルジェンタはバッグから食料を取り出し、フラスコと一緒に少女に差し出した。{/n}「私のをどうぞ。親の過ちのために子供が苦しむべきではありません」
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta takes rations from her bag and holds them out to the little girl along with her flask.{/n} "Take mine. Children should not suffer for their parents' mistakes."

traits.locale_text: {n}アルジェンタはバッグから食料を取り出し、フラスコと一緒に少女に差し出した。{/n}「私のをどうぞ。親の過ちのために子供が苦しむべきではありません」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}阿洁塔从包里拿出了口粮，和她的水壶一起递给了小女孩。{/n}“把我的食物拿走吧，孩子们不该为父母犯下的错误受苦。”
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta takes rations from her bag and holds them out to the little girl along with her flask.{/n} "Take mine. Children should not suffer for their parents' mistakes."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿洁塔从包里拿出了口粮，和她的水壶一起递给了小女孩。{/n}“把我的食物拿走吧，孩子们不该为父母犯下的错误受苦。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta nimmt Rationen aus ihrem Beutel und reicht sie dem kleinen Mädchen.{/n} "Nimm meine. Kinder sollten nicht unter den Fehlern ihrer Eltern leiden."
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta takes rations from her bag and holds them out to the little girl along with her flask.{/n} "Take mine. Children should not suffer for their parents' mistakes."

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta nimmt Rationen aus ihrem Beutel und reicht sie dem kleinen Mädchen.{/n} "Nimm meine. Kinder sollten nicht unter den Fehlern ihrer Eltern leiden."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta fouille dans son sac et en extrait des rations qu'elle tend à la petite fille avec sa flasque.{/n} « Tiens, prends. Les enfants ne devraient pas payer pour les erreurs de leurs parents. »
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta takes rations from her bag and holds them out to the little girl along with her flask.{/n} "Take mine. Children should not suffer for their parents' mistakes."

traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta, çantasından kumanya çıkararak onu matarasıyla birlikte küçük kıza uzatıyor.{/n} "Benimkini al. Çocuklar, ebeveynlerinin hatalarının cezasını çekmemeliler."
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta takes rations from her bag and holds them out to the little girl along with her flask.{/n} "Take mine. Children should not suffer for their parents' mistakes."
